org.jgentleframework.core.reflection
Interface MemberIdentification<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Identification<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldIdentification, MethodIdentification
public interface MemberIdentification<T>
extends Identification<T>

The Interface MemberIdentification represents all common methods of an Identification Member.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

 void setDeclaringClass(java.lang.Class<?> declaringClass)
          Sets the declaring class, the class declares current member.
 void setFoundOnSuperclass(boolean bool)
          Set up foundOnSuperclass boolean, if setting value is true, returned data of Identification.getMember() method shall be found on declaring class of current member and its super class, if false, the returned data of Identification.getMember() method shall be only found on declaring class.

Methods inherited from interface org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.Identification
getMember, setName
 

Method Detail

setFoundOnSuperclass

void setFoundOnSuperclass(boolean bool)
Set up foundOnSuperclass boolean, if setting value is true, returned data of Identification.getMember() method shall be found on declaring class of current member and its super class, if false, the returned data of Identification.getMember() method shall be only found on declaring class.

Parameters:
bool - the desired boolean data.

setModifiers

void setModifiers(int modifiers)
Sets the modifiers. Only members have corresponding modifiers are returned by Identification.getMember() method. If 'modifiers' is not specified, the default value of 'modifiers' will be Identification.NO_MODIFIERS, it means the Identification member is not specified modifiers.

Parameters:
modifiers - the modifiers to set

setDeclaringClass

void setDeclaringClass(java.lang.Class<?> declaringClass)
Sets the declaring class, the class declares current member.

Parameters:
declaringClass - the declaringClass to set
